name: HTTP
description: This App facilitates making HTTP requests as actions

base_url.description: Base URL for making queries. (e.g. https://myservice/)

test_path.description: Endpoint for test connectivity. (e.g. /some/specific/endpoint , appended to Base URL)

oauth_token_url.description: URL to fetch oauth token from

actions.description: Validate connection using the configured credentials
actions.verbose: This action will perform a GET on the configured base_url. The action will succeed if given a status code between 200 and 399 (inclusive). Therefore, if the given base URL requires no authentication, this action may pass even if the supplied credentials are incorrect. Alternately, if the given base URL does not point to a valid endpoint, this action could fail even if other actions may succeed with valid location parameters.

actions.description: Perform a REST PUT call to the server

example_values: Can't process response from server. Status Code: 404 Data from server: {"failed": true, "message": "Requested item not found"}

actions.description: Perform a REST PATCH call to the server

example_values: Can't process response from server. Status Code: 404 Data from server: {"failed": true, "message": "Requested item not found"}

actions.description: Perform a REST DELETE call to the server

example_values: Can't process response from server. Status Code: 404 Data from server: {"failed": true, "message": "Requested item not found"}

actions.description: Perform a REST HEAD call to the server
Perform a REST OPTIONS call to the server
Perform a REST GET call to the server

example_values: Can't process response from server. Status Code: 404 Data from server: {"failed": true, "message": "Requested item not found"}

actions.description: Perform a REST POST call to the server

example_values: Can't process response from server. Status Code: 404 Data from server: {"failed": true, "message": "Requested item not found"}

actions.description: Retrieve a file from the endpoint and save it to the vault
actions.verbose: Provide the file path and file name to download into the vault. For example, /web_storage/file.tgz.

file_path.description: Path of the file to download (include filename)

actions.description: Put a file from the vault to another location
actions.verbose: Provide the path to store the file on the file server. For example, /web_storage/test_repo/.

host.description: Hostname/IP with port number to execute command on

file_name.description: Name of the file to be put on endpoint
